events.message: I want to request a refund because the product I received is different from what was advertised and I am very disappointed.
The issue has been categorized under Refund as the customer is requesting their money back due to product dissatisfaction.
An agent has been assigned to the case to assist with the refund request and to guide the customer through the process.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you're unhappy with your purchase and I’m here to help you with the refund.
Could you please provide your order number and any photos of the item for us to verify the issue and process your refund?
The order number is 123456789, and I have attached pictures showing that the product is clearly not what was advertised.
Thank you for the details. We’ve approved your refund request. Please return the item to the address provided, and once received, we will process your refund promptly.
Thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help resolving this issue quickly.
We have received the returned item and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure that your refund was received and that you are satisfied with the resolution. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
This case is now closed. We appreciate your business and hope to serve you better in the future.
